title: Special Events
description: Special Events - a special event by Bard on the Beach Shakespeare Festival in Vancouver's Vanier Park.

venue.name: Bard on the Beach
venue.description: Bard on the Beach is Western Canada's largest professional Shakespeare festival, presented in modern theatre tents in a spectacular waterfront setting in Vancouver's Vanier Park.
